title: Our spacious efficiencies don't skimp on space, just price! SPECIALS!

posting_body: ['$500 off August rent when you look and lease today!', 'Ridgetop Apartments', '11153 Shipside Ln Nw, Silverdale, WA, 98383', 'Interested in more information?', 'Visit link below:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 32', 'OR Text', '32', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team directly.', 'Welcome to Ridgetop Apartment Homes!', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 711 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Ridgetop Apartments offer newly renovated 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments with washer/dryers, fireplaces and modern conveniences in Silverdale, WA, less than 2 miles from Highway 3 and Highway 303.', 'We are also in close proximity to The Trails at Silverdale and the Kitsap Mall.', 'Enjoy our spectacular views of the Olympic Mountains and on-site 24/7 fitness centers, pool and spa, and professional management.', "Plus, we're within 8 miles of Bremerton, Bangor, Harrison Medical Center and Puget Sound Naval Shipyard so you can easily commute to work.", 'The 'Pet Policy', 'Cats and Dogs are allowed.', 'We do allow pets in our apartment communities.', 'Our policy is as follows: *1.', 'Only 3 pets are permitted in each apartment.', '*2.', 'It is our policy to accept only dogs, cats, birds and fish.', 'Acceptance of dogs is based on breed.', '*3.', "Breed restrictions are as follows: Pit Bull/Staffordshire Terriers, Rottweilers, Dobermans, Saint Bernards's, Great Danes, German Shepherds, Chows, Presa Canarios, Akitas, Alaskan Malamutes, Wolf-hybrids, full blood or mixed at a percentage are prohibited from residing at our Community.", '*4.', 'A Pet Agreement and Fee will be required for the first pet and an additional non-refundable fee may apply for additional pets.', '*5.', 'Service animals may accompany a resident with a verifiable disability for the purpose of aiding that person are not considered pets.', 'GwTRNLR2cqB']
